.. _`preFilter`:

PREFILTER
=========

Filter isoform expression





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_isoformSwitchAnalyseR_preFilter:
        input:
            switch_list = "switch_list.RDS"
        output:
            rds = "filtered.RDS"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/isoformSwitchAnalyseR/preFilter"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:
  * extra: Extra parameters for function preFilter, besides "switchAnalyzeRlist"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
